sn3.4:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho* rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn3.4:4.3: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn3.4:4.4: ‘kesaṃ nu kho piyo attā, kesaṃ appiyo attā’ti?
sn3.4:4.6: ‘ye ca kho keci kāyena duccaritaṃ caranti, vācāya duccaritaṃ caranti, manasā duccaritaṃ caranti;
